option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Android/IntelliJ .gradle/ /local.properties /.idea/ /build/ /captures/ .externalNativeBuild/ *.iml
# Kotlin/Java *.class *.jar *.war *.ear
# Gradle .gradle/ **/build/ !gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar
# Android Studio .idea/ .DS_Store
# Keystore **/*.jks **/*.keystore
# Misc *.log *.tmp
# Ignore local env files .env
# Exclude generated Google services files (add yours if needed) google-services.json
# Node/npm node_modules/ dist/
# PWA build outputs pwa/dist/
# Backend artifacts backend/**/bin/ backend/**/obj/
# Terraform state infra/terraform/*.tfstate infra/terraform/*.tfstate.backup
